body: Long story. I was casually playing eu sarefine a few minutes ago, dropping tons of kids like I do. Then, out of nowhere I got quickdropped by some randy and got pissed, so I punched a hole in my monitor. Um, I kinda need a replacement very soon within a $400 budget. Yeah, that's it.

replies.body:
The guy needs a monitor, not a brand new computer. He mentioned a 400$ budget, and suggesting a mac is completely fucking stupid because it will be way beyond his price range. Oh and macs are only good for work, because they don't lag, no viruses, etc but if you want something mainly for gaming then windows or linux are the best options out there.
EDIT: sorry for being rude
